channel.title: About the Introductions category
channel.description:
If you're using a pseudonym here, then we'd appreciate it if you would post a little about your experience with Rebol (or what got you interested).
And of course, if you're a long time Rebol user back from whenever, and have been on the mailing list etc, then feel free to mention this. Add any Github or other Repos, and LinkedIn if you wish.
Please post your introduction as a [New Topic in the Introductions Category](https://forum.rebol.info/c/introductions), vs. a reply to this message.

item.title: About the Introductions category
item.dc:creator: gchiu
item.description:
If you're using a pseudonym here, then we'd appreciate it if you would post a little about your experience with Rebol (or what got you interested).

And of course, if you're a long time Rebol user back from whenever, and have been on the mailing list etc, then feel free to mention this. Add any Github or other Repos, and LinkedIn if you wish.
